name: Alex Mace (@alex@mace.social)
summary:
So, because a fucking *sports* presenter publicly diagreed with Government policy, he’s taken off air?

and because a nature show presents *facts* that are awkward, it can’t be broadcast, in case the right wing press gets upset?

Remind me who are #snowflakes and have a problem with #CancelCulture?

The Government lickspittles at the top of the #BBC need to fuck off back into their holes.
